message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a unique and highly valuable item that I'm confident you'll find interesting. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see that you're a serious buyer, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to meet you at $850000. My counteroffer to you is $920000. I believe this price reflects the product's true value, and I'm willing to consider it a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above that price. Would you be willing to meet me at $900000?

I understand you're still a bit above $900000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $920000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so my final counteroffer to you is $915000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, Bob. I'm eager to hear your response.
